title: Baladea Fitness and Wellness System with Holly Perkins
description:
Discover the smarter way to exercise with Holly Perkins all-new fitness and wellness system. Baladea's revolutionary combination of fitness and wellness exercises helps you score the body of your dreams in no time! Baladea includes 8 wildly effective workouts for a complete body makeover. It's the perfect solution for anyone who wants to slim down, tone up, and feel energized - fast! Looking gorgeous has never felt better.
Why Baladea works:

Studies show that stress reduction and relaxation can significantly improve weight loss. Baladea takes full advantage of this discovery by fusing fitness and wellness into one wildly-effective combination. This revolutionary approach is called Synergy Training. Simply put, it's designed to give you more results in less time.

Workouts:

â€¢ Boost (43 min): Maximize weight-loss with dynamic high intensity interval training.
â€¢ Power (50 min): Build your fat-burning engine with next-generation strength training.
â€¢ Slim (40 min): Melt fat and reveal beautifully toned muscles with this energetic workout.
â€¢ Fusion (47 min): Extra pounds don't stand a chance against this cardio-yoga combo.
â€¢ Yoga (45 min): Reshape your trouble zones with this next level yoga practice.
â€¢ Flow (31 min): Let your body flow to optimize flexibility and beautify your posture.
â€¢ Calm (24 min): Energizing relaxation blended with powerful motivation techniques.

Also Includes:

â€¢ Hello (10 min): Introduction and Overview of the Program; Say hello to the new you! Find out how to get breakthrough results.
â€¢ Nutrition Guide.
â€¢ Lifestyle Guide.
â€¢ Three different Routine Schedules.

Equipment Required: Resistance Tubing (or Resistance Band, but Tubing would be better); Workout Mat (Yoga Mat recommended for the Yoga Workout); Towel for some Stretching segments (substitute with belt or yoga strap or something similar); Yoga Blocks (optional)
Type of Workout: Aerobics, Yoga, Toning, Stretching
Fitness Level: All Levels (includes modifiers and optional partner exercises in various segments)

Meet the Instructor:

Holly Perkins holds a B.S. in Exercise Physiology and Nutrition from Penn State and has been a celebrity trainer for over 16 years. Holly's workouts come straight from her experience working with athletes and notable celebrities who demand expert fitness and nutrition advice that delivers results quickly
